name: Sugar Cubes Clicker
description:
Sugar Cubes Clicker is a project I made for my OOP class (pun intended). I plan to use some ideas and coding I've learned in the future for a new game I'm developing. 

Things you should know:
- To select a product you must click on its name.
- To close the game use ALT+F4.
- It's just a prototype, so the game doesn't save.

I appreciate any feedback! Thanks for playing :)
